PHRASE.LANG: When worn in Spunland enables the wearer to create clouds at twice the normal speed. [#Legal]
Bei Benutzung in Spunland kann der Träger Wolken doppelt so schnell wie normal erschaffen. [#Legal]
When worn in Spunland enables the wearer to create clouds at twice the normal speed. [#Legal]
When worn in Spunland enables the wearer to create clouds at twice the normal speed. [#Legal]
Al llevarla en Spunland, permite al portador crear nubes el doble de rápido. [#Legal]
Ceux qui la portent dans Spunland pourront créer des nuages deux fois plus vite que la normale. [#Legal]
Quando indossata a Spunland, permette a chi la porta di creare delle nuvole al doppio della velocità normale. [#Legal]
